data.description:
Where people can learn more about libertarianism by asking libertarians about it. For the LP's official stance on political issues, visit https://www.lp.org/issues/

Note that this guild is meant exclusively for questions, not for the discussion of topics that may be of interest to libertarians. Thus, our only rules are:

‚ÄîQuestions only.

‚ÄîRelevant questions only.

data.description:
Guild about the eccentric billionaire, founder of Tesla and SpaceX. 

"Imagine being so ambitious, accomplished and intelligent that colonizing Mars is literally one of the goals you're likely to achieve...and imagine the hubris of wasting his time with derogatory tweets and too-clever-by-half nitwits second-guessing his plans"

data.description:
Got a game you like? Write a review.  Got a Review you Like Post it 

If your writing a review please format posts

Game Title | Review Location, and a XXX/100 score. 

Ex . Super Mario World | Retro Reviews 85/100

**Rough Guidlines:**

- Common Sense
- Try not to be a dick
- Focus on the game not the poster.

**Other Communities to Check Out**

- +FreeGames
- +Gaming
- +GamingNostalgia
- +PCGaming

data.description:
Guild for free, useful and no-bullshit websites.

***Rules***:

1. Website must be free to use.
2. Website must be useful; it must allow you to do a specific task or provide you with information about something. 
3. The title of your post should be a brief summary of what the website is/does and should follow this format: **summary** - **website name**
4. No social media.
data.description_html:
Guild for free, useful and no-bullshit websites.

Rules:

  1. Website must be free to use.
  2. Website must be useful; it must allow you to do a specific task or provide you with information about something.
  3. The title of your post should be a brief summary of what the website is/does and should follow this format: summary - website name
  4. No social media.
data.name: WebsiteDirectory

data.description:
A guild to share auto enthusiast content, pics, articles and more.  Classic cars, modern cars, Custom cars and even stock restorations or industry icons.  If it's cool, it belongs here. 

When posting images, please post only direct image links. Image posts that are not albums, direct image links or not a fit in the guild theme may be kicked at moderator discretion. No advertisements.

related guilds;

+Cars

+ClassicCars

+Corvettes

+RatRods

+IdiotsInCars

data.description:
Help raise awareness, engage in discussion and show your ongoing support for American companies making things in America.  

Discuss any companies (even large corporations/franchises) seen selling American-made goods.  Share your stories of older American-made products of companies that still exist to this day, or even those whom seize to exist.  

Putting a focus on bringing back the ass-busting hard-working manual labor is a welcome sight to any red-blooded American Patriot and we look forward to seeing your discussions of quality American-made products.
data.description_html:
Help raise awareness, engage in discussion and show your ongoing support for American companies making things in America.

Putting a focus on bringing back the ass-busting hard-working manual labor is a welcome sight to any red-blooded American Patriot and we look forward to seeing your discussions of quality American-made products.
